class.name: RemoteTransform
class.brief_description: RemoteTransform leads the [Transform] of another [Spatial] derived Node in the scene.
class.description: RemoteTransform leads the [Transform] of another [Spatial] derived Node (called the remote node) in the scene. It can be set to track another Node's position, rotation and/or scale. It can update using either global or local coordinates.

members.member: The [NodePath] to the remote node, relative to the RemoteTransform's position in the scene.
If [code]true[/code] the remote node's position is tracked. Default value: [code]true[/code].
If [code]true[/code] the remote node's rotation is tracked. Default value: [code]true[/code].
If [code]true[/code] the remote node's scale is tracked. Default value: [code]true[/code].
If [code]true[/code] global coordinates are used. If [code]false[/code] local coordinates are used. Default value: [code]true[/code].
